name: Gaap
content:
Gaap

Rai of the Water Devils

Source Inner Sea Gods pg. 326
Pathfinder Wiki Gaap

Details

Alignment LE
Pantheon Infernal Dukes
Areas of Concern Divination, illusion, water
Domains Evil, Law, Rune, Water
Subdomains Devil (Evil), Devil (Law), Oceans, Rivers, Wards
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Shortspear
Symbol Three circling sharks
Sacred Animal(s) Shark
Sacred Color(s) Gray, white

Obedience

Drown a living creature in any amount of fetid water. Gain a +4 profane bonus on saving throws against divinations.

Boons - Infernal Dukes

Source Book of the Damned pg. 116
The Lords of Hell, the Dukes of Perdition, and the Princes of Damnation are all names for the infamous nobility of the Pit- the elite caste of devilkind known as the infernal dukes.

All infernal dukes are lawful evil and range in power from CR 26 to CR 27. The boons they grant are less complex than those granted by archdevils, manifesting as spell-like abilities usable once per day each.

1: water breathing
2: circle of clarity
3: weird

For Followers of Gaap

Feats

Hellish Shackles
